title: The Animal Guessing Game
description: Do your children like animals? Do they enjoy playing games? Amazing for kids of all ages, the book is focused on formulating questions and solving problems based on clues. A great bedtime story and a great way to pass the time on long car trips. The book comes to life with vivid pictures and imagination. The best part is that when you are done reading the fun has just begun. There are so many animals out there for you and your children to guess. On your next road trip leave the DVDâ€™s at home and enjoy some quality family time with The Animal Guessing Game.
author: Leela Hope
